title: Wish i had refunds so i could get support champs
body:
I'm not kidding, i really like the role

I played a game just then and loved it... and it really shows.

Worth playing league if my life was in a crisis/10


EDIT: No this wasn't ranked

replies.body:
Ouch. That match history. 
That is why I don't want to play Ranked. 
It's a scary place.
____
{{champion:201}} support is my favourite. You get in front of the ADC's face with an early {{item:3082}} and they deal half damage. It's funny.
Braum's passive is so strong if enemies don't watch out for it.

Plus the ult is great for interrupting ganks, the slow gives your carry time to punish the enemy laners

EDIT: Don't play ranked, ever
